 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֵ֫לָּא‎</span> **adverb** ==above== (from **noun** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֵל‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎א‎</span>- of direction, [[BDB#Dalm|D]]<sup>§ 44. l n</sup>.; Nabataean, Egyptian Aramaic, ***id.***, [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>341</sup> [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>A 5</sup>+; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֵיל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֵילָא‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> in <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***above***); — [[Dan.6.3|Dan 6:3]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֵ֫לָּא מִנְּהוֺן‎</span> ***above*** (over) them (compare [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>96. 2</sup>, [[Deut.28.43|Deut 28:43]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]).
